string.text: No, we had nothing to do with it. Our experiment began after the Chernobyl accident.

This is the transport we take our agents to different parts of the zone. Agents infiltrate the stalker environment and carry out the tasks they were programmed to do without even realising it. Unfortunately, more than half of the agents die in transit as the zone is very unstable.
Hello, I see you have a lot of questions for me. Ask them and then we'll decide what to do with you.
The choice is yours

Stalker is the name of a programme to code a person to perform certain tasks. On the approaches to the centre of the zone, we've positioned several psi units. The largest of these is known to you as the brain incinerator. Anyone who tries to pass to the centre of the zone comes under our control. Then they get coded, become our agents and get a "stalker" tattoo. Spread them around the zone, we influence the course of events and keep ourselves safe. Don't forget to subscribe!

You're a loose cog in the machine. On one of your trips to the centre of the zone, you got too close to us. Our defences against infiltration were thought to be perfect, but you managed to find a path we didn't know existed. We couldn't let anyone else know our secret. Mankind is not yet ready to know the truth about the causes of the zone. So we immediately began coding our agents to destroy you. For some unknown reason, the equipment malfunctioned, and we didn't notice that you yourself were among the stalkers who fell under our control. As a result, you've been tasked with killing yourself.

The Zone is the result of an out of control experiment with the naosphere, the Earth's information field. We were going to tap into the naosphere to explore the possibility of influencing it. However, during the experiment, there was a breach and the energy of the Naosphere rushed to Earth, changing everything around it. That's how the anomaly you call the zone was formed.

What happens next is up to you. The zone is slowly but steadily growing. Our forces are barely strong enough to contain the flow of energy from the Naosphere. You can join us. Our forces will grow, and perhaps we can take control of him. You could destroy us. Then the energy of the Naosphere would flow unimpeded into the zone. There's no telling where that would lead.

We're THE CONSCIOUS. A group of researchers who set out to change the world. It is known that the Earth is surrounded by a special information field - the Naosphere. It is closely connected to all sentient beings on the planet and stores all their mental images. We decided to tap into the naosphere and make changes. By removing all the dark things that have spawned humanity, to make the world perfect. No human mind is powerful enough to interact with the naosphere. So we have united our consciousness.

Chernobyl NPP was the most suitable place for our experiments. Firstly, there were very few people left here after the 1986 accident, so we were able to work without a spare. Secondly, the station provided us with the energy we needed to run the plants. Thirdly, there were powerful antennas near the station, which were used in experiments to influence people's consciousness.
Grab the olives, bitches!
Grab the olives, bitches!
Go away, Kozlov!
Get out, you arseholes!
Guys, pinch the cocksuckers!
Guys, pinch the cocksuckers!
Blow up and follow me!
All right, let's go, boys!
It's time for business! Shine your bagpipes!
Don't rub it in, Kodlam, don't rub it in!
What's up, boys?
Don't crowd, don't crowd, scatter quickly!
No, you're really annoying!
What a load of bollocks, you're just going for a meal
Who the fuck is that again?
I'm going to kill everyone!
It's kind of a joke, isn't it?
You're a real cocksucker!
Losers are out, shmanay shovels, guys!
Heh-heh! They're stuffing the bulls!
Faggots are here! Get them!
Faggots are here! Get them!
Fryers are here! Guys who want to shoot, come here!
Fryers are here! You guys who want to beg, come here!
Guys, come with us, let's go deer slashing!
Guys, come with us, we're gonna kill a deer!
All right, Nah, I say jump, you jump, I say shoot, shoot. You got it?
When I tell you, let's get the fuck out of here! Are we done?
We'll start fucking around when I say so!
Whoa! There they are, the thieves!
Whoa! There they are! Freyra!
Guys, the pimps are here!
Guys, the pimps are here!
Chicky-dicky, here you are!
Chicky-picky, we got the fur coat!
That's it, boys, we've got the spot!
That's it, boys, we've got the spot!
That's it, you cocksuckers! This is our zone now!
That's it, you cocksuckers! This is our zone now!
We got moose! We got the spot!
We got moose! We got the spot!
Bollocks!
All right, here we go!
Get out, bitch!
Don't slow down, bruv! We're getting fucking steamy here!
Don't slow down, bruv! We're getting fucking steamy here!
We're getting tired of waiting! Give the signal!
Listen, we're sick of waiting! Give the signal!
Listen, what are you doing in front of the technician? The boys are tired of waiting!
Hey, what are you doing in front of the technician? The boys are tired of waiting.
Burkali on your head, keep your eyes open, they're coming!
Burkalina, Timicka, keep your eyes open! They're coming!
It's too early, Zhora, to drink borjom! They're coming again!
It's too early, Zhora, to drink borjom! They're coming again!
Everyone's on guard and don't fuckin' go early!
Everyone's on guard and the niggers are early!
Everything's all set, everything's in place, waiting for your go-ahead!
Everything's in order, everything's in place. We're waiting to hear from you.
We're in position! When you unzip, give me the signal!
We're in position! Uncloak and honk the horn!
Well, we're, like, already here. My koi attack, bro?
Well, we're, like, already here! My kotaku, bro!
Atanda, did you guys draw us?
Atanda, you guys drew us!
Oh, that's not going to work!
Shit, the slow approach didn't work!
Hey, we've been spotted!
Hey, we've been spotted!
Hey, guys, it's us!
Did you guys go out to graze or something?
Hey, I don't get it, is the pipe even gonna get picked up or what?
Hey, guys, we're in a bit of a pickle here, you girls!
We're in a bit of a pickle, we've got to punch this kid!
Anyway, it's some bullshit from the boys. Why don't you go and see what's going on?
The boys are fucking hiding. We should go to the place and see what's going on.
That's a shitty question, we'll get it!
Don't be afraid, bogor, we'll be spared!
She's spotted! We're pulling out!
We're, like, happy to see you, yeah.
We're, like, happy to see you, yeah.
Hey! What do you say we let the goats have it?
Hey! What do you say we let the goats have it?
You guys blew it!
Sha! On the circles!
Walk slower, gleefully run!
All right, talk fast, what do you want?
Like I'm listening.
I mean, hello!
What's new?
What are you looking at Zenke for? What do you want?
What's the big deal?
So, what did you want to talk about?
Don't shine your beer, you don't need to!
Zanikal Valina, Birienka!
You're tough, aren't you? Put that bagpipe away!
Hey, you dumb bastard, you're waving that gun around!
What the fuck are you doing? Fuck the gun!
You're mysterious!
Hear me, you mistake of nature. No bazaar, no blinkers, you got it, no?
When the prosecutor shows up, I'll get you to shut up with him, whoo!
What an arsehole!
No, this is the first time I've ever seen one that's so fucked up!
I'll give you girls like you're talking about.
Sishe, sit with the others and talk, I'll pass!
My mate's no good to me right now!
It's really fucked up!
What the fuck are you doing?!
Go ahead and shoot, then we'll talk!
Why did you drink your mittens?! We'll talk about it later!
If you have any questions, go to Brigadier!
Go roll your ears, my unknowing ones!
If you need a rubdown, there's the pahan!
What are you talking about with a gun in your paws? Put it away!
Get your head in, then we'll have a chat!
Either fuck the gun or fuck you.
Are you confused about the rums or something? Speak up!
You're really starting to freak me out.
Look, I'm nervous. Why are you acting like a fish?
Do you want something or don't you want something? I'm happy with them!
All right, quick, what do you want?
Like I'm listening.
What are you looking at Zenke for? What do you want?
So, what did you want to talk about?
You lost your tongue up your arse?
What are you, Bucky, defective?
Cheese, maybe you're a moron
Holy shit! I can't stand frostbite!
Are you trying my patience?
Bros, am I the only dumb one here, or did everyone misunderstand what this is about?
You're a mould, you could have told me about Stirlitz!
Ha-ha! That's hilarious!
Eh, it's really heartbreaking!
Yeah, Cupcake, if you played the pussy like that, you'd be shitting yourself
I'm a pure woodsman!
We didn't have shit to play with when we were kids.
Lavender, tufted lavender
No, no, no, no, that's not it, no, no, no, no, you're bullshitting!
No, no, well, guys, tell me, I just don't get it, was it like music? There and on, and I'm such music!
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! You're a fucking chertyla on the fucking tour! Ha! I'm answering!
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Nya, you're a comedian! Come on!
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha Drawing, TNAAA, really drawing
You all right? Do you want to make some money? Or do you want to blow the cash on booze?
Welcome to the best bar in the Zone!
Come here, stalker! Get well!
Come and have a word with me when you're back here.
Always happy to hear from those who have a story to tell!
Come back again, don't forget the kolobok!
What do you want, mercenary?
What's the problem, mercenary?
Are we talking? I'm listening.
Good luck to you!
So long!
The fight is healthy!
You want to shoot?
Ready to see what kind of marksman you are?
Come on, those who have not been in the zone, don't be shy, targets don't fight back.
You tore it up with your results, old man!
If you have anger in your heart, stop by. It's a good thing to tear it up on the targets.
That's quite a shootout you got going on there.
What brings you here, mercenary?
Break a leg.

Attention! The ejection is over!
Warning! According to the instrument readings, we're approaching the ejection. Take cover now!
Attention! Ejection commencing! Repeat, it's starting to blow! Take cover now!
Holder
Come on in, the bartender's waiting.
Come in, come in.
Hey, stalker, come and talk to me, but hide the gun.
Come in, don't be long!
You can't come in here!
Talk to the bartender.
Stop! You can't come in here now!
Stalker, you've entered an area under control. Any attempt to attack our people will be punishable by death.
Ten seconds please, the fight is on!
20 seconds please, the fight is on!
30 seconds! The fight is on!
FORTY SECONDS! THE FIGHT GOES ON!
30 seconds! The fight is on!
It's been a minute! The fight continues!
Tonight in the arena is the monstrously bloodthirsty and perpetually hungry CRAVOSOSOS! Against the bloodsucker will be a man, almost a man, and he is not called that for nothing!

Meet the inhabitants of the underground darkness in the arena tonight, that kills at a distance and tears you apart. There are no barriers to it, no defence against it. Some will say it's a horrible underground carny, but I will, that it's Bührer. Against the Bührer will come a hero whose adventures will never end.
You may ask, where is our hero? I'll tell you where! He got scared for his own skin and ran away! Look for this coward at the bar, where he's ducking his sad soul!
Oh my god, lying there not breathing, he's killed, he fought well, but at the last moment, yeah, someone remove the corpse in the charge.
Attention! Attention! A new fight is about to begin in the arena, that we're going to enjoy thanks to our one and only and a powerful purveyor of monsters MUST!
Time's up, but the fight goes on!
Victory! En got him! But wait! Wait! What is it? An didn't make it to the cancelled time And I lost! But despite this sad whimpering Yay! Our winner!
Today in the arena is a white and somewhat fluffy, but incredibly evil pseudo-dog! The pseudo-dog will be opposed by the unknown who came from nowhere!

Today, the arena of martial arts and proper nutrition is sultry Terrible Snork The Snork will be opposed by a human A man without a past Last time he showed what he can do Let's see what happens this time
And so... GUM! GUM! It's on!
Victory! You managed to put your opponent down in the time allotted and won! Hooray for our winner!
Victory! Hooray for our winner!
Someone you know is in the arena tonight. Someone you love. Someone who hates you with all his wild animal nature. Yes, yes, yes! It's a terrible and invincible beast!
